title: Nobody Puts Swayze in the Corner: the Tao of Swayze
description: You got your Tao in my Swayze. Your Swayze's in my Tao. Within the ancient passages of the Tao Te Ching there is great wisdom on how to live your daily life; how to live the "Way". The same life lessons can be found in the sage-like colloquies born out of Patrick Swayze's storied film career. This book pairs the philosophies of the Tao with Various quotes from Patrick Swayze's movies, offering inspiration and humor. Proceeds from this book will be donated to help fund Cancer Research. Please visit the publisher, Vicious Books, for more information.
author: Phil Callaway
